cves.description: Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Azon Dominator. This vulnerability allows an attacker to execute JavaScript code in the victim's browser by sending them a malicious URL using the “q” parameter in /search via GET. This vulnerability can be exploited to steal sensitive user data, such as session cookies, or to perform actions on behalf of the user.
problemType: CWE-79 Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting')
